<<<<<<< HEAD
The seven champions of Christendome Acted at the Cocke-pit, and at the Red-Bull in St. Iohns streete, with a generall liking. And never printed till this yeare 1638. Written by I.K. Kirke, John, d. 1643.
[86] p.
Printed by I. Okes, and are to be sold by Iames Becket at his shop in the Inner Temple Gate, London : 1638.
Dedication signed: Iohn Kirke. Partly in verse. Signatures: A-L⁴ (-A1). The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[86] p.
Printed by I. Okes, and are to be sold by Iames Becket at his shop in the Inner Temple Gate, London : 1638.
Dedication signed: Iohn Kirke. Partly in verse. Signatures: A-L⁴ (-A1). The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

his shop in the Inner Temple Gate
